attributes.action: deport any immigrant and their familys who commit a crime(felony)within ten years of entry into this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
too many immigrants are committing crimes and getting a slap on the wrist.
deport them and their families as a deterent to others.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/deportnonukcrimi/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
